mapper.insert: insert into restaurantmanager (rm_id, rm_pw, rm_email, rm_name, rm_phone, rm_business) values (#{rm_id},#{rm_pw},#{rm_email},#{rm_name},#{rm_phone},#{rm_business})

insert into restaurant (rt_name, rt_closed_days, rt_price_lunch, rt_price_dinner, rt_accept, rt_dfc_num, rt_dreg_num, rt_description) value(#{rt_name},#{rt_closed_days},#{rt_price_lunch},#{rt_price_dinner} ,'N',#{rt_dfc_num},#{rt_dreg_num},#{rt_description})
mapper.update: update restaurantmanager set rm_rt_num=#{rt_num} where rm_num=#{rm_num}
mapper.insert: insert into `menu`(mn_name, mn_price, mn_content, mn_mt_num, mn_rt_num, mn_div) value(#{mn_name}, #{mn_price}, #{mn_content}, #{mn_mt_num}, #{mn_rt_num}, #{mn_div})
mapper.update:
update `menu` set mn_name=#{mn_name},
mn_img=mn_img,
mn_img=#{mn_img},
mn_price=#{mn_price}, mn_content=#{mn_content}, mn_mt_num=#{mn_mt_num}, mn_rt_num=#{mn_rt_num}, mn_div=#{mn_div} where mn_num=#{mn_num}
mapper.insert: insert into restaurantdetail(rd_rt_num, rd_phone, rd_closed_days, rd_info, rd_home, rd_addr) value(#{rd_rt_num},#{rd_phone},#{rd_closed_days},#{rd_info},#{rd_home},#{rd_addr})
mapper.update: update restaurantdetail set rd_phone = #{rd_phone}, rd_closed_days = #{rd_closed_days}, rd_info = #{rd_info}, rd_home = #{rd_home}, rd_addr = #{rd_addr} where rd_rt_num=#{rd_rt_num}
mapper.insert: insert into rescoupon (rec_content, rec_state, rec_period, rec_rt_num) value (#{rec_content},#{rec_state},#{rec_period},#{rec_rt_num})

insert into businesshour (bh_start, bh_end, bh_seat_max, bh_seat_current, bh_table_max, bh_table_current, bh_state, bh_rt_num) value(#{bh_start}, #{bh_end}, #{bh_seat_max}, 0, #{bh_table_max}, 0, #{bh_state}, #{bh_rt_num})
mapper.update: update businesshour set bh_start = #{bh_start}, bh_end = #{bh_end}, bh_seat_max = #{bh_seat_max}, bh_table_max = #{bh_table_max}, bh_state = #{bh_state} where bh_num=#{bh_num}
mapper.select: select * from businessdate where bd_rt_num=#{rt_num} order by bd_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into `businessdate` (bd_date, bd_off, bd_open, bd_close, bd_brstart, bd_brend, bd_loam, bd_lopm, bd_rt_num) value (#{bd_date}, #{bd_off}, #{bd_open}, #{bd_close}, #{bd_brstart}, #{bd_brend}, #{bd_loam}, #{bd_lopm}, #{bd_rt_num})
mapper.update: update businessdate set bd_date = #{bd_date}, bd_off = #{bd_off}, bd_open = #{bd_open}, bd_close = #{bd_close}, bd_brstart = #{bd_brstart}, bd_brend = #{bd_brend}, bd_loam = #{bd_loam}, bd_lopm = #{bd_lopm} where bd_num = #{bd_num}
mapper.insert: insert into resnews (rn_content, rn_state, rn_rt_num) value (#{rn_content}, #{rn_state}, #{rn_rt_num})
insert into restaurantfacility (rf_fa_num, rf_detail, rf_rt_num) value(#{rf_fa_num}, #{rf_detail}, #{rf_rt_num})
